corrosiff0.1.0

?

Function corrosiff::close_siff_extern

source · 
#[no_mangle]
pub extern "C" fn close_siff_extern(reader: *mut SiffReader)
Expand description

close_siff_extern(reader) frees the memory allocated for the SiffReader object in lieu of freeing the memory in C.

§Arguments

  • reader - A pointer to the SiffReader object

§Example

void *siffreader;
close_siff_extern(siffreader);
